posts.title: 我的第一篇博客
posts.excerpt: 这是我的第一篇博克花了两天终于把自己的博客网站建起来了，虽然过程有点小复杂，但感觉还是挺好玩的。
posts.text: 这是我的第一篇博克花了两天终于把自己的博客网站建起来了，虽然过程有点小复杂，但感觉还是挺好玩的。 接下来我要完善博客，之后绑定域名，在博客中添加装饰品。 然后把原本写在CSDN上的一些文章搬运到这里来。

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
